parameters.name: maxScanRows
parameters.x-ms-summary: Number of rows for automatic field type detection
parameters.description: Number of rows for automatic field type detection. Default = 20

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Skip a number of rows at beginning. Default = 0

parameters.name: skipLast
parameters.description: Stop at a specific row. Default = convert all rows

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: Separator (delimiter) of the fields. Default = 'Automatic detection of separator'
